doc.field: Significant Office of Collective Bargaining decisions (1978-1979); Recommendations for legislation (1978-1979); Meeting notes from the Columbia Law School Board of Visitors meetings (1992-1996); 1980 transit strike correspondence; Parity case memos, notes, briefs and decisions (1974-1976); Public Employment Relations Board court decisions, memos, and notes (1977-1982)
